issue.title: Importing dedalus causes lots of CPU to be used

content.raw: Hi Steve.  Can you try just running "from mpi4py import MPI" on the affected system and see if this has the same result?  Dedalus doesn't do too much at import, so my best guess is that it's an issue with one of the dependencies, and MPI is the heaviest candidate.
content.html: Hi Steve. Can you try just running "from mpi4py import MPI" on the affected system and see if this has the same result? Dedalus doesn't do too much at import, so my best guess is that it's an issue with one of the dependencies, and MPI is the heaviest candidate.
